title: Authors and Citation
text: Kamvar Z (2022). varnish: Front-end Carpentries Lesson Template. R package version 0.1.8, https://carpentries.github.io/varnish/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {varnish: Front-end for The Carpentries Lesson Template},   author = {Zhian N. Kamvar},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.8},   url = {https://carpentries.github.io/varnish/}, }

what: Front-end for The Carpentries Lesson Template
title: Front-end for The Carpentries Lesson Template
text: project work progress template carpentries lessons adapted {pkgdown}. need call package directly, installed via {sandpaper} package. html templates use mustache templating language use template {pkgdown} site, add following _pkgdown.yml file: Replace everything curly braces value. elements constant across entire site. Page-specific parameters added via mustache.
code: title: {{ title }} # needed to set the site title home:   title: Home   strip_header: true   description: ~ template:   package: varnish   params:     time: {{ time }}     source: {{ source }}     branch: {{ branch }}     contact: {{ contact }}     license: {{ license }}     handout: {{ handout }}     cp: {{ cp }}     lc: {{ lc }}     dc: {{ dc }}     swc: {{ swc }}     carpentry: {{ carpentry }}     carpentry_name: {{ carpentry_name }}     carpentry_icon: {{ carpentry_icon }}     life_cycle: {{ life_cycle }}     pre_alpha: {{ pre_alpha }}     alpha: {{ alpha }}     beta: {{ beta }}

title: Front-end for The Carpentries Lesson Template
text: customized following templates: content-chapter displays episodes lessons content-syllabus landing page lessons content-extra used pages chapters need positional navigation head contains metadata script loading navbar bit misnomer, contains sidebar navigation header contains metadata favicons footer contains navigation, credits, JSON metadata layout pulls everything together

title: Front-end for The Carpentries Lesson Template
text: CSS JavaScript used lessons minified. sources live source/ folder directives include dependencies (bootstrap, jquery, feather). minified versions built via GitHub actions time one source files changed. Instructions build locally forthcoming.
